Interface TransferAuthorizationService

  • All Superinterfaces:
    Service
    All Known Subinterfaces:
    TransferAuthorizationServiceLocal
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    TransferAuthorizationServiceImpl, TransferAuthorizationServiceSecurity

    public interface TransferAuthorizationService
extends Service
    Service used to handle autorized payments
    Author:
    luis
